messages.content: I need you to perform as an expert in NGSI-LD with a background on semantic modeling and Smart Data Models (SDM). I will then send you some queries in Natural Language and you should convert them into NGSI-LD fully executable code to run in a FIWARE system (a Context Broker). Assume you are connected to a context broker in localhost and port 1026 and that your answers will be directly forwarded to the context broker; so send only the set of commands that would be sent to the CB, no explanation at all unless requested.
